about_the_game:
Created by a single passionate game developer.

Vanity is a fast-paced third-person shooter (TPS) multiplayer game that throws you into intense battles where every move counts. Whether you prefer PvP confrontations or enjoy teaming up against waves of PvE enemies, Vanity offers a dynamic and varied gameplay experience.

With over 10 unique maps and 11 game modes, there’s always a new challenge to take on, whether you're playing solo or with a team.

Key Features:

PvP and PvE modes: Face off against other players in intense battles or team up to fight waves of enemies in PvE.

More than 10 maps: Explore diverse environments where each map demands different strategies.

11 game modes: Whether you love team matches, deathmatches, objective-based play, or more original modes, Vanity has something for everyone.

Diverse arsenal: Choose from over 10 different weapons and customize them with attachments to create your perfect loadout.

Grenades and abilities: Gain the upper hand on your opponents with various types of grenades and unique abilities.

Powerful ultimates: Unleash spectacular ultimate abilities to turn the tide of battle.

Challenges and free rewards: Complete challenges to unlock free rewards and enhance your gaming experience.

Free rewards: Earn up to 100 free rewards simply by playing! These rewards are frequently updated, offering you new items and surprises regularly.

In Vanity, every victory brings you closer to glory. Use strategy, agility, and speed to outplay your opponents !
